item.title: VQ-Map: Bird's-Eye-View Map Layout Estimation in Tokenized Discrete Space via Vector Quantization
item.description: VQ-Map leverages vector quantization to estimate bird’s-eye-view maps with unprecedented accuracy, setting new benchmarks.
